dcterms:creator: H. Gjoreski
M. Ciliberto
L. Wang
F. J. Ordonez Morales
S. Mekki
S. Valentin
D. Roggen
dcterms:description: A highly versatile and precisely annotated dataset dedicated to mobility-related human activity recognition, providing 750 hours of labeled locomotion data. It includes multimodal and multilocation locomotion data recorded in real-life settings, with a total of 16 modalities including accelerometer, gyroscope, cellular networks, WiFi networks, audio, etc.
dcterms:title: SHL Dataset

dcterms:creator: M. Zhang
A. A. Sawchuk
dcterms:description: A daily activity dataset for ubiquitous activity recognition using wearable sensors, containing body-motion modalities of 12 daily activities collected from 14 subjects using MotionNode, a 6-DOF inertial measurement unit.
dcterms:title: USC-HAD

dcterms:creator: M.-C. Yu
T. Yu
S.-C. Wang
C.-J. Lin
E. Y. Chang
dcterms:description: A dataset containing accelerometer, gyroscope, and magnetometer data sampled at 30Hz from smartphone built-in sensors in the context of energy footprint reduction.
dcterms:title: HTC-TMD

dcterms:creator: C. Carpineti
V. Lomonaco
L. Bedogni
M. Di Felice
L. Bononi
dcterms:description: A dataset featuring motion data collected from 13 subjects using smartphone built-in sensors for custom dual transportation mode detection.
dcterms:title: US-TMD
